original_text: The two angels came to Sodom in the evening, and Lot was sitting in the gate of Sodom. When Lot saw them, he rose to meet them and bowed himself with his face to the earth
korean_text: 저녁 때에 그 두 천사가 소돔에 이르니 마침 롯이 소돔 성문에 앉아 있다가 그들을 보고 일어나 영접하고 땅에 엎드려 절하며

sentences.original_text: The two angels came to Sodom in the evening
and Lot was sitting in the gate of Sodom
and bowed himself with his face to the earth
